resources.string: All advertisement will be removed and you will be able to access adult jokes. \n\nThis was done to protect children from the strong language they may contain.

- More jokes added 
- Back Button added 
- Now you can buy pro version to remove banners and unlock adult jokes. 
- Other minor improvements 
 
Have a great time!"

Thanks for using Only Jokes! This is an independent app, made by one person (me). I\'m an English tutor and I dedicate much of my free time developing this and other apps, in the hope they will help many people learn English and have a good time. If you find any errors or typos, please send me an email, and I\'ll fix them as soon as possible. Most of these jokes were found on the web, if you own any of them, contact me and I\'ll give you the credits for it. Keep sending jokes and suggestions!

Credits:\n
Icons made by Madebyoliver and FreePik from www.flaticon.com is licensed by CC 3.0 BY
